abstract: McGraw Hill Financials announces agreement to acquire SNL Financial for $2.2 billion in cash.
lead_paragraph: The deal is expected to strongly complement S&P Capital IQ’s offerings in banking and insurance and expand the analytics and capability of Platts.

headline.main: McGraw Hill Financial Buys SNL Financial for $2.2 Billion
headline.print_headline: McGraw Hill Agrees to Buy SNL Financial

snippet: The deal is expected to strongly complement S&P Capital IQ’s offerings in banking and insurance and expand the analytics and capability of Platts.
